reviewText: Walter Wangerin speaks directly into the camera. Nothing flashy at all. He doesn't need to. He lets the Commandments speak for themselves. Of course, the God-gift he has with language also contributes to this thought- provoking and relevant and reverent conversation with God's Law. I used this presentation in the college classroom and it was well received. They are short enough to use in any class room situation with enough to chew on for large group discussion.
